CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.1)
# CMake 最低版本号要求
PROJECT (alyun-assist) 

if(WIN32)
    set(LIB_NAME third_party)
    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE} /MT")
    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG   "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} /MTd")
	add_definitions(-DUNICODE -D_UNICODE)
	add_definitions(-DCURL_STATICLIB)
else(UNIX)
    INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(/usr/include)
    LINK_DIRECTORIES(/usr/lib)
    LINK_DIRECTORIES(/usr/local/lib)
    add_compile_options(-std=c++11)
endif()

aux_source_directory(ccronexpr DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(json11  DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(jsoncpp DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(md5 DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(optparse DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(zip DIR_SRCS)
aux_source_directory(sqlite3 DIR_SRCS)
ADD_LIBRARY(third_party ${DIR_SRCS})
